alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila County, Tonto National Forest Foothills (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 28 at 12:51AM MST until June 28 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND HIGH FIRE DANGER FOR NORTHEAST MARICOPA AND SOUTHERN GILA COUNTIES... * AFFECTED AREA...Southern Gila County/Tonto National Forest Foothills. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30-35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent. * IMPACTS...Fuels are dry and fire danger is high. These conditions combined with low relative humidity and strong winds will lead to widespread hazardous fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials and fire crews in the field of this red flag warning.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila County, Tonto National Forest Foothills
